modName: Light Iron and Banded Iron Armor
summary: A small change from heavy to light class.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#000000][center][i][b][color=#ffffff][color=#ff0000]
IMPORTANT![/color] - this plugin [color=#ff0000]doesn't add[/color] new pieces of armor, it just changes the class of existing ones.[/color][/b][/i][/center][/color]
So, basically, this plugin changes iron & banded iron armor class from heavy to light. Why did I do that change?
Because I use light armor and I really like the look of the banded iron armor, but it was only available in heavy version.

This plugin changes the class of:
[b][i]- Banded Iron Armor
- Banded Iron Shield
- Iron Armor
- Iron Helmet
- Iron Boots
- Iron Gauntlets
- Iron Shield
[/i][/b]
The archive contains two .esp plugins:Â  [color=#ffff00][b]ACTIVATE THE PLUGINS SEPARATELY![/b][/color]
[i][b]- buffed version (it makes iron & banded iron armor pieces slightly more powerful than steel armor)
- default version (default stats of armor rating, weight etc.)
[/b][/i]
Oh, and light armor perks do affect these pieces of armor.

Yeah.

Maybe some of you will find this plugin useful, I dunno really.
